comments.body: so we will still detect edge, it's just `sdkNameAndVersion` will be empty? is this what we should be doing if we can't verify it's chromium-based?

It looks like the empty string is used to make sure it fails the version constraint check later (although you'd think `sdkNameAndVersion` would be `unknown` like the `GoogleChromeDevice` one):
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/152af5aba7eddf8f25c9369313986e8da8973484/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/web/web_device.dart#L282-L284

I see https://github.com/flutter/flutter/pull/56173#discussion_r419719180 as well.  \cc @jonahwilliams

It seems like it will fall through to a version check failure, are you fine with this change as-is, @christopherfujino?  I can also dig in more and try to figure out another way to verify it's chromium based (though I don't have a Windows dev environment). I would hope `reg` being missing from the search path is pretty rare.
